name: First and last name
scanQr: Scan the QR code with your Swish app or use the number below.
whenConfirmed: Once you have made the payment in your Swish app, click on 'Next'.
artCoordinator: Your art coordinator confirms the payment.
welcome: Welcome to Artportable! You can now close this window.
chat: Chat and get inquiries about your artwork
follow: Follow and interact with other artists
readArticles: Read articles and get updates about exhibitions
